column1: How is Crete today, Chania & Rethymno region? Hope that all of you are OK! Is it worse visiting with small children now? We have tickets and everything booked at the 20th of April till middle of May, but i don't have the whole picture of current situation.I read that Crete sufferes serious infrastructure damage from the flood. And Doctors say there are grow of epidemic after flood. Have you observed some?Thank you for your comments!

"And Doctors say there are grow of epidemic after flood." This is Crete, not Mozambique!

Thank you Jill! You are very helpful!! as always;)Hope our lovely place on the Earth won't suffer from flood. Too much for the beginning of the year :(Jean, if you read what is going on after flood on the Earth, fruits, etc. you will find lots of interesting staff. Anyway, thank you for geographical lesson.
